queries.query: SELECT PRODUCT_ID, NAME, CATEGORY, COST, STOCK, SOLD_OUT FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID
INSERT INTO PRODUCT(PRODUCT_ID, NAME, CATEGORY, COST, STOCK, SOLD_OUT) VALUES(PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE PRODUCT SET NAME=?, CATEGORY=?, COST=?, STOCK=?, SOLD_OUT=? WHERE PRODUCT_ID=?
INSERT INTO ORDERS(ORDER_ID, ORDER_DATE) VALUES(ORDERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEM(ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, QUANTITY, PRICE) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE PRODUCT SET STOCK = STOCK - ? WHERE PRODUCT_ID=?
